page.title: 11A WRITER'S DAY.
page.content: { Writer}Mrs. Evelyn Taws lives at 81, Charnwood Rd,{Hillingdon. }She gets up at 7.30 am. At breakfast she reads her fan letters. Mrs Taws lives and works at home. Though she often travels, she usually uses the bus and train. If she is excited about the book that she's writing she will write all day. Otherwise she types about 5000 words in the morning which takes up about two or three hours. She then stops for some food at mid-day. Then she types or writes for another three hours. At 4.00 pm she stops for coffee. When she is writing a book she does not do much housework. She does not go out in the evenings but stays in and corrects the work she has done. She usually goes to bed at midnight. {'A Nurse In Time'}her first book is her favourite.
